Material used.Material Source: Lymphoblastoid cell lines and blood cells
Material used.Description: Analysis of SNCA expression in lymphoblastoid cell lines and blood cells from a heterozygous patient with p.Ala53Thr mutation.

Readout description.Result Description: Monoallelic expression of SNCA with epigenetic silencing of the mutant allele and upregulation of the wild-type allele compared to control individuals.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SNCA allele expression in control individuals.

Basic negative control.Description: Silenced mutant allele expression in the patient.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal expression levels observed in control individuals (no specific threshold provided).

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Abnormal expression levels defined by monoallelic expression and epigenetic silencing of the mutant allele (no specific threshold provided).
